name: Squirrel Nut Quest
description:
Made for the Weekly Hour Game Jam - W9 2017

Theme: Squirrel

You are a squirrel. Collect as many nuts as you can and avoid the crows.
Stay to the branches. There's no collision checking for it, but you're on your honor. ;)

It could have been more, but Construct 2 was hiding the behavior menu from me.
